definition[0]: money that you do not have to work hard to get
example[0]: We can buy them for $10 and sell them for $25 â€“ easy money.
definition[1]: money that you earn very easily, without having to work hard
example[1]: People were tempted into the trade by the thought of easy money.
definition[2]: when there is easy money, banks and other organizations are willing to lend money, and interest rates are low
example[2]: Interest rates tumbled, and easy money financed both growth and inflation.
